analysis.description:
BftCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#881-889) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(beneficiary) == 0)

Reentrancy in BftCrowdsale.BftCrowdsale (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#781-822):
	External calls:
	- preMintTokens() (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#819)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- owner (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#819-822)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#476-490) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#485-486)

BftCrowdsale.preMintTokens (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#842-849) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(preSaleBfPlatform,300000000 * etherInWei) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#842-843)
	-token.mint(companyHolding2y,300000000 * etherInWei) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#843-846)
	-token.mint(rewardPool,200000000 * etherInWei) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#846-847)
	-token.mint(shareholdersHolding1y,100000000 * etherInWei) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#847-848)
	-token.mint(tokenSaleCosts,70000000 * etherInWei) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#848-849)

BftCrowdsale.checkSaleEnded (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#849-858) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(rewardPool,tokenCap.sub(token.totalSupply())) (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#857-858)

BftCrowdsale.transferTokenOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol)
ERC20.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#21-22) should be declared external
StandardToken.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#133-136) should be declared external
Pausable.pause (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#259-264) should be declared external
Pausable.unpause (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#265-266) should be declared external

BftToken.changeName (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#664-665) should be declared external
TokenTimelock.release (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#720-726) should be declared external
BftCrowdsale.addWhitelist (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#898-902) should be declared external
BftCrowdsale.remWhitelist (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol#902-905) should be declared external

BftCrowdsale.transferTokenOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x48599941665827f9ea5a16c3d7417a43a1ce5df4.sol) should be declared external
